entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
